Activity: Log in, emails. Check the latest news on AI and machine learning in game development. See if there are any tools or techniques that could be useful for our project.
Experiment with different lighting setups in the test scene. Try different light types (directional, point, spot) and shadow settings.
Research different techniques for creating visual effects (VFX). Look into particle systems, post-processing effects, and custom shaders.
Start prototyping a simple particle effect (e.g., dust motes) in the test scene. Experiment with different particle properties (size, speed, color, lifetime).
Lunch - Order in today, feel like staying in and watching a quick YouTube video during lunch.
Research post-processing effects. Look into techniques like bloom, ambient occlusion, and color grading.
Implement a basic color grading effect in the test scene. Adjust the contrast, saturation, and hue to achieve a desired look.
Meet with @lvdn-1 to review the progress on the test scene and the visual effects. Get their feedback and suggestions.
Document the workflow and the structure for the VFX production, including the format and some example cases.
